entry.title: Thursday: Clearing. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Clearing early this morning. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 this morning. High minus 25. Wind chill near minus 39. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 32. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 37 this evening and minus 47 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
